sentences.english: Clerked at One-and-One clothes Store in charge of sales, 1992.
sentences.chinese: 1992年，在一加一服裝店當店員，負責銷售。

sentences.english: A shop assistance hung it on a rack or placed it on a table with many others.
sentences.chinese: 店員把它掛到貨架上，或與其它東西一起擺到桌子上。

sentences.english: The guy warned me that you have to knock on the door first to scatter them away.
sentences.chinese: 店員警告我說開門前最好先敲敲門，以便把它們嚇跑。

sentences.english: Clerked at One-and -OneClothes Store in charge of sales, 1992.
sentences.chinese: 1992年，在壹加壹服裝店當店員，負責銷售。

sentences.english: Ensures and is accountable for adherence to applicable wage and hour laws for non-exempt and minor store partners.
sentences.chinese: 確保並負責對所有店員應用相關的工資及工時政策。

sentences.english: And when I said hello to cashiers and clerks, I got better service.
sentences.chinese: 當我向出納員或店員問好時，能得到更優質的服務。

sentences.english: After I paid the money, the shop assistant gave me a receipt.
sentences.chinese: 我付過錢之後，店員便給了我一張收據。

sentences.english: I dressed well and talked to staff in the store.
sentences.chinese: 我穿得很體面時髦，並且輕快的跟店員交談。

sentences.english: The clerk refused to sell her alcohol because she didn't have her ID card.
sentences.chinese: 店員拒絕賣酒給她，只因爲她沒帶她的身分證。

sentences.english: Have so an inn, counterjumper very calm ground accost I come in sit.
sentences.chinese: 有這麼一家店，店員很坦然地招呼我進來坐。

sentences.english: Shops have been closed this week so employees can reprice goods.
sentences.chinese: 商店本週關閉，以便讓店員對商品進行重新定價。

sentences.english: The clerk again says no, and the duck leaves.
sentences.chinese: 店員又說沒有，鴨子於是就離開了。

sentences.english: The clerk gives customers a long face.
sentences.chinese: 這個店員對顧客擺一張臭臉。

sentences.english: John is talking to a furniture store clerk about buying a new living room set.
sentences.chinese: 約翰正和傢俱店店員談及要買一套新客廳傢俱的事。

sentences.english: Talk to the clerk at the vintage store to see whether there is a section set aside for your designer of choice.
sentences.chinese: 和復古店的店員交談看自己選擇的設計師是否有專櫃。

sentences.english: Clerk says if I tear pages out of a book I have to buy it.
sentences.chinese: 店員說如果我撕破書頁就必須把它買下。

definition: sales counter/front desk/bar/(of markets, medicines etc) OTC (over-the-counter)
take-out (fast food)/(outer part of) tire/as well/besides/into the bargain/outer zone
to pay the bill/to settle accounts/also written 結賬|结账
to pay the bill/to settle accounts/also written 結帳|结帐
